''For the Welsh rugby union player see [[Adam Thomas (rugby union player)]]'' {{Infobox actor | name = Adam Thomas | image = | imagesize = | caption = | birth_name = | birth_date = {{Birth year and age|1987|08|11|df=y}} | birth_place = [[Cheetham, England|Cheetham]], [[England]] | occupation = [[Actor]] | years_active = 2002-present | website = }} '''Adam Thomas''' (born 1987 in [[Manchester]], [[England]])<ref>[http://www.waterlooroad.co.uk/library/int_wr1/wr1_at.html]</ref> is a British actor, currently starring in British ITV soap opera ''[[Emmerdale]]'' as [[Adam_Barton_(Emmerdale)|Adam Barton]] well known for his role in BBC drama ''[[Waterloo Road (TV series)|Waterloo Road]]'' as [[Donte Charles]]
==Career== It was in 2002, at the age of 15, that Adam started his television career with a guest appearance on the BBC daytime soap opera ''[[Doctors (2000 TV series)|Doctors]]''. It was another four years before Adam rose to fame in his breakthrough role as [[Donte Charles]] in the BBC drama series ''[[Waterloo Road (TV series)|Waterloo Road]]'' of which he was an original cast member upon its inception in 2006.
The role of Donte led Adam to enjoy guest appearances in popular hospital drama ''[[Casualty (TV series)|Casualty]]'' in 2008 in which he played a boxer, as well as a second appearance in ''[[Doctors (2000 TV series)|Doctors]]'' in 2007. He also appeared as himself on ITV gameshow ''[[All Star Family Fortunes]]'' alongside his older brother and fellow actor [[Ryan Thomas|Ryan]], who plays [[Jason Grimshaw]] in the soap [[Coronation Street|Coronation St.]].
In early 2009 it was confirmed that Adam was to leave ''Waterloo Road'' at the end of the fourth series due to his character having finished his education at the fictional school. Adam's final episode was broadcast 20 May 2009.
Following his departure from his most famous role, Adam signed on for his third appearance on daytime soap ''Doctors'', this time playing a character called Ben Hamilton. The episode aired on 26 May 2009. <ref>[http://www.digitalspy.co.uk/soaps/a149059/doctors-casts-another-soap-sibling.html]</ref>
It was announced on 21 May 2009 that Adam had landed the role of Adam Barton on the long-running ITV [[soap opera]] [[Emmerdale]] and would appear on screens from July 2009. <ref>[http://www.itv.com/Soaps/emmerdale/newsandgossip/Anewfamily159/default.html]</ref>.
==Personal life== Adam is the younger brother of [[Ryan Thomas]] who gained fame as [[Jason Grimshaw]] in ''[[Coronation Street]]''. He has a twin brother, Scott, although they are not identical.
